snippet: The shoe missed Andres Behring Breivik, who is accused of killing 77 people last year, but it disrupted the proceedings.
abstract: Norwegian man is escorted out of Olso courtroom after throwing a shoe at Anders Behring Breivik, who confessed to killing 77 people in 2011.
lead_paragraph: The shoe missed Andres Behring Breivik, who is accused of killing 77 people last year, but it disrupted the proceedings.

headline.seo: Breivik Trial in Norway Killings Is Disrupted
headline.main: Shoe Thrown at Defendant in Norway Murder Trial
